resources.string: Permission to record audio was denied.
All permissions must be granted to use the ARCompanion app.
The LoaderOBJ object is null or its parsed object is invalid. The loaded robot model cannot be rendered.
Transform data status code was not valid. Check your Point object and the TangoSupport.getMatrixTransformAtTime parameters
Parsing the loaded .obj file failed. Check if the .obj file is valid by loading it into Blender or MeshLab, and if the material used is non-null.
The Point of Interest name cannot be empty.
This class is a utility class and should never be instantiated.
"Tango threw an exception! Check your Tango configuration and make sure it and its listeners are connected and implemented properly."
Error in setting up TangoConfig! Check your configuration keys and values!
Tango API call error within OpenGL thread
Failed to retrieve TangoPoseData. Could not get depth camera pose at time %d
Failed to retrieve TangoPoseData. Could not get color camera transform at time %d
Depth of touch position is null at time %d
This device is not localized. Please localize first before proceeding.
Touch position is null. Try clicking in another spot or move the phone closer.
The robot\'s world was invalid and cannot be used. Please set a valid world using the app RobotApp or pick another robot.
An error has occurred when loading this robot\'s map. Check if the map is valid or try another one.
Add a new Point of Interest (POI)
Parsed object for the loaded .obj file came up null. Check if the loaded .obj file is valid and a valid material is present in the file.
